td.content: s:patient presents with moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate diarrhea. she has history of moderate wheezing associated with food intake. patient is a 59 year old female lumberjack. she drinks at least 4 beers a day Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 70 in, Weight 104 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.

td.content: s:60 yr old white female lumberjack presents with 9 days history of worsening moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate wheezing associated with food intake and moderate diarrhea. she denies smoking pt has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 69 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.
